title: Generate Post-Event Report
description: Following a large concert, the venue's general manager needs a report summarizing key performance metrics.

tasks.description: Gather final attendance data from the access control system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the final count of scanned tickets.

tasks.description: Gather total gross sales data from the food and beverage and merchandise systems.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the final sales figures.

tasks.description: Gather a summary of all security and medical incidents from their respective logs.
Compile all data into a standardized post-event report template.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a comprehensive report summarizing all key metrics.
